author.name: Gurpreet Singh

author.subtitle: Front-end Architect
author.short_description: Building a greener web: where code meets sustainability to shape a better digital future. üåçüå±
author.description: I am working as Senior Architect eXperience Engineering (front-end architect) with Publicis Sapient. Having more than 15 years of experience in the area of jQuery, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. My expertise is to work on full stack-based projects using NodeJS and ReactJS.
